ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I camped out in the mino cave for a couple of hours last night.  Just saw Lorand Diddlenob (sp?) and Theathertag something, both gnomes, fighting the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I camped out in the mino cave for a couple of hours last night. Just
saw Lorand Diddlenob (sp?) and Theathertag something, both gnomes, fighting
the minos there. Neither would respond to may hails (when visible). Maybe
I need better faction. The two will die occasionally and I have been
hoping Bidl will spawn in there place, but I dont know.

Also, in Kaladim, i'm viewed amiably by the dwarves (for some reason) but
the dwarf in the mino cave views me apprehensively. Also, the wood elfs in
Kelethin view my apprehensively, but the wood elf in the mino cave views me
amiably. Weird!
